list-object.object_en:
This email is to notify you that the $dqlvalue("select v.alias_value from d2_dictionary d,d2_dictionary_value v where d.object_name = v.dictionary_name and d.object_name = 'Workflow Name Alias Lookup' and d.alias_name='lookup value' and v.object_name = '$value(workflow_name)' and v.i_position=d.i_position enable (ROW_BASED)") has been completed for $value(package_name), $value(package_title).
The status of the document has transitioned to $dqlvalue("select v.alias_value from d2_dictionary d,d2_dictionary_value v where d.object_name = v.dictionary_name and d.object_name = 'Domain Document Status Display' and d.alias_name='$value(package_object_type)' and v.object_name = '$value(document_status)' and v.i_position=d.i_position enable (ROW_BASED)") .
Click here to access the document
